title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 593.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 593.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to any provider of service, licensed pursuant to Part 594 or Part 595
of this Title, which proposes to operate a residential program for adults with
mental illness and/or children or adolescents with serious emotional
disturbance. (b) This Part does not
apply to the operation or proposed operation of a proprietary
program. (c) This Part does not
apply to the operation or proposed operation of service-enriched single room
occupancy program. (d) This Part
does not apply to the operation or proposed operation of congregate type
residential programs for adults of greater than 16 beds. (e) The standards of reimbursement in section
593.7
of this Part shall be in
effect as long as continued Federal financing participation is
assured. (f) This Part does not
apply to crisis residence programs. (g) This Part does not apply to the operation
of a community residence for eating disorder integrated treatment (CREDIT)
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
593.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
